basics.name: Matthew Nuzzaco
basics.label: programmer
basics.summary: Programmer with 15+ years experience working in the software industry with a focus on internet platforms. I enjoy building efficient systems and solving big problems

work.summary: Industrial IoT company providing analytics for manufacturers. Sight Machine allows manufacturers to connect their facilities together to a cloud based software platform. This Sight Machine plaform gives manufacturers access to machine vision quality control systems, operational efficiency tracking complex analytics such as process control, root cause analyis and machine learning algorithms.
highlights: Designed and set standards for CI/CD pipelines
Successfully converted from legacy EC2/hardware based systems to containers running on Kubernetes

work.summary: Game studio developing massively multi-player software platform. Idle Games pioneered the social media focused MMOG genre with their flagship title Idle Worship.
highlights: Wrote automated gameplay testing software and results tracking system

work.company: Adobe Systems Inc - San Francisco, CA
work.summary: Worked on Adobe's experimental mobile application systems team. We were developing a system for phones to download and use 3rd party software on limited capacity feature phones.
highlights: Operated backend system for managing software delivery to mobile phone subscribers
Worked with carriers such as Verizon and NTT DoCoMo to debug and support live systems

work.summary: Software and internet technology government contractor.
highlights: C#/ASP .NET system for the United Sates Postal Service
Developed various internet based software management systems

education.institution: Rochester Institute of Technology - Rochester, NY
